mapper.select: SELECT a.ID AS sessionId, c.ID AS otherUserId, c.NAME AS otherUserName, d.message AS latestMessage FROM (SELECT ID, USER_ID FROM SESSION_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) a LEFT JOIN SESSION_INFO b ON a.ID = b.ID LEFT JOIN USER_INFO c ON b.USER_ID = c.ID LEFT JOIN MESSAGE_INFO d ON a.ID = d.SESSION_ID AND b.LATEST_MESSAGE_ID = d.ID WHERE b.USER_ID != #{userId} AND d.STATUS = #{status} GROUP BY b.ID;
